item.description:
With movies like The Secret and What the Bleep, there is a growing community of people interested in the Law of Attraction (LOA) and other Universal Laws. Our desire is to bring together like-hearted folks interested in exploring ways of living and using the principles of these Universal Laws, to attract more of what they want into their lives.

We find that members who get the most from our LOA community
are those who ACTIVELY participate, share and support each other.
We hope you feel the same too and will share your wisdom, joy & involvement with our group.

We look forward to meeting-up with you!


Dave


ChewHoong

topics_item.name: What the Bleep do we Know?

item.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group
